description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The town of StormGate is under siege, from the onslaught of its enemies, who seek to destroy it. You are put in charge to manage the town of StormGate as you build defences to slow down the approaching hordes and construct buildings to help improve the town’s infrastructure.
description.short: The town of StormGate is under siege, from the onslaught of its enemies, who seek to destroy it. You are put in charge to manage the town of StormGate as you build defences to slow down the approaching hordes and construct buildings to help improve the town’s infrastructure.
